pages.text: All it takes is a single well-considered hit... or so the saying must have gone.$(br2)Whatever.$(br)On a related note: you invented First Strike. It will be a great help especially against many weak opponents.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Greatly increased damage if the target has full life.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a $(item)common Book$() with First Strike by surrounding your $(l:enchanting/enchanter)Enchanter$() with $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and the other required materials.

pages.title: Enchantment Upgrading
pages.text: Upgrading First Strike from level 1 to level 2 is fairly cheap at first.$(br)This price will quickly increase to more and more $(l:general/pigment)Pigment$() and experience for each additional level.
